raytracer.data
Class Vector

java.lang.Object
  raytracer.data.Vector

public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a vector on which some basic operations are defined. The arguments of the methods will not be checked, the method will behave unexpectedly if these arguments are incorrect or illegal. The user of this class will have to take care of this.

Author:
Karsten Daemen

add

public void add(Vector A,
                Vector B)

Adds the vector A to this vector and stores the result in vector B. It's the user responsibility to make sure that each vector has the same dimensions.
